feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 3:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 80.5 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023
